role.argrole: amount increased by, EXT or MNR

example.parse: (VP (PRT (PART اي)) (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يتضاعف) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM عائد) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاستثمار))) (NP-ADV (NOUN_NUM+CASE_DEF_ACC ست) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN مرات))))))))) (PUNC .))
